cmd.deployHomepageInteractive.description: Injects a Next.js homepage with links for onboarding, demo, and live sessions.

cmd.fireSession.description: Trigger a new Hookah+ session (start timer, log metadata, attach flavor config).

cmd.deployDashboard.description: Deploy the Hookah+ dashboard UI via Netlify using the existing token and config.

cmd.capturePOSWaitlist.description: Capture email and metadata of lounge partners interested in POS plugin integration.

cmd.openWhisperMemory.description: Open the Whisper Memory Panel for reflection, notes, or trust log replay.

cmd.spawnVisualGrounderSketch.description: Initiate visual grounding sketch to parse layout photo and auto-generate seating zones.

cmd.alignMainPortalUI.description: Align the main homepage at hookahplus.net to the updated onboarding, demo, and live flow.

cmd.registerLoungeConfig.description: Register YAML configuration for lounge pricing, flavor logic, and QR session mapping.

cmd.bundleDeployKit.description: Bundle the deployable UI + metadata kit and push it to GitHub/Netlify automatically.

cmd.switchDomain.description: Switch the live domain to hookahplus.net and apply routing changes.

cmd.triggerReflexDeployChainRealignment.description: Log and realign the deploy chain state across Codex, Netlify, and GitHub PR history.
